member.name: M:MFramework_Unity.Tools.SqliteTool.TransActionOperate(Mono.Data.Sqlite.SqliteConnection,Mono.Data.Sqlite.SqliteCommand)
member.summary: ---事务 事务就是对数据库一组按逻辑顺序操作的执行单元。 用事务的好处就是成熟的数据库都对 密集型的磁盘 IO 操作之类进行优化，而且还能进行撤回回滚操作。其实在上面改变列名的示例中就用过。

member.name: M:MFramework_Unity.Tools.SqliteTool.Order(Mono.Data.Sqlite.SqliteConnection)
member.summary: 整理数据库 SQLite 的自带命令 VACUUM。用来重新整理整个数据库达到紧凑之用，比如把删除的彻底删掉等等。

member.name: T:MFramework_Unity.Tools.PathUtil
member.summary: A class which handles various Unity specific paths.

member.name: M:MFramework_Unity.Tools.PathUtil.GetDocumentFolderPath
member.summary:
Retrieves Application.persistentDataPath depends on the given platform.
iOS - /var/mobile/Applications/[program_ID]/Documents : read/write Android - [External] /mnt/sdcard/Android/data/[bundle id]/files : read/write [Internal] /data/data/[bundle id]/files/ : read/write WEB Player - / Windows Player - [UserDirectory]/AppData/LocalLow/[Company]/[Product Name] : read/write OSX - [UserDirectory]/Library/Caches/unity.[Company].[Product] : read/write Windows Edtor - [UserDirectory]/AppData/LocalLow/[Company]/[Product] : read/write Mac Editor - [UserDirectory]/Library/Caches/unity.[Company].[Product] : read/write

member.name: M:MFramework_Unity.Tools.PathUtil.GetDocumentFilePath(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a path of combining Application.persistentDataPath with the given filename.

member.name: M:MFramework_Unity.Tools.PathUtil.GetRelativelyPath(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 生成完整的带扩展名的文件路径

member.name: M:MFramework_Unity.Tools.PathUtil.GetTemporaryCacheFolderPath
member.summary:
Retrieves Application.temporaryCachePath depends on the given platform.
iOS - /var/mobile/Applications/[program_ID]/Library/Caches : read/write Android - [External] /mnt/sdcard/Android/data/[bundle id]/cache [Internal] /data/data/com.xxx.xxx/cache/ WEB Player - C:\Users\username\AppData\Local\Temp\UnityWebPlayer\log\log_UNIQUEID.txt Windows Player - %LocalAppData%/Local/Temp/Temp/%Company%/%Product%

member.name: M:MFramework_Unity.Tools.PathUtil.GetTemporaryCacheFilePath(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a path of combining Application.temporaryCachePath with the given filename.

member.name: M:MFramework_Unity.Tools.PathUtil.GetStreamingAssetsPath
member.summary:
Retrieves Application.streamingAssetsPath depends on the given platform.
iOS - /var/mobile/Applications/[program_ID]/[appname].app/Data/Raw (read only) Android - [External] jar:file:///data/app/[bundle id].apk!/assets (read only, accessiable via www) [Internal] jar:file:///data/app/[bundle id].apk!/assets (read only, accessiable via www) WEB - Application.streamingAssetsPath : empty Windows Player - [Exe file]/[Exe file]_Data/StreamingAssets : read/write OSX Player - [Exe file].app/Contents/Data/StreamingAssets : read/write Windows Edtor - [ProjectDirectory]/Assets/StreamingAssets : read/write Mac Editor - [ProjectDirectory]/Assets/StreamingAssets : read/write

member.name: M:MFramework_Unity.Tools.PathUtil.GetStreamingAssetsFilePath(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a path of combining Application.streamingAssetsPath with the given filename.

member.name: M:MFramework_Unity.Tools.MonoSingleton`1.OnDestroy
member.summary: 当播放停止时，Unity 会以随机顺序销毁对象 若单例 gameObject 先于其他对象销毁，不排除这个单例再次被调用的可能性。 故而在编辑器模式下，即便播放停止了，也可能会生成一个 gameObject 对象残留在编辑器场景中。 所以，此方法中加把锁，避免不必要的单例调用

member.name: F:MFramework_Unity.Tools.AutoSingletonAttribute.autoCreate
member.summary: autoCreate 是否自动创建单例

member.summary: resPath 从指定的预制体路径生成单例

member.summary: 对SQLite数据库执行增删改操作，返回受影响的行数。

member.summary: 执行一个查询语句，返回一个关联的SQLiteDataReader实例
member.param: 执行SQL查询语句所需要的参数，参数必须以它们在SQL语句中的顺序为准

member.param: 执行SQL查询语句所需要的参数，参数必须以它们在SQL语句中的顺序为准

member.summary: 执行一个查询语句，返回查询结果的第一行第一列
